programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E14, In Wisconsin, advances in forensic clay modeling help investigators identify a murder victim whose skin was stripped from her head, neck, and legs. And in California, police track down two boys who enjoy satanic rituals and setting fires.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E20, DNA found on a marijuana joint in Florida in 2005 helps to solve the 1988 rape and murder of a California woman. And a cold case of murder in Illinois heats up when a jailhouse lawyer turns jailhouse snitch.

programme.title: The Boy And The Monster/Secret In The Cellar
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E02, In Portland, Maine a housewife disappears. One year later her body is unearthed in the cellar. I.R. unravels this cold case investigation from the inside out. With the help of science, police are able to uncover a blueprint of the crime.

programme.title: A Lesson in Homicide
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E11, When a schoolteacher is found murdered in her New Jersey apartment in the fall of 2009, suspicion is cast on her soon to be ex-husband. Long after the case goes cold, a detective embarks on a mission to help the man clear his name.

programme.title: Taken in Tacoma
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E06, When 13-year-old Jennifer Bastian is abducted and murdered in August of 1986, residents of Tacoma panic. This is the second young girl killed in five months. Convinced a predator is loose, Police embark on a 32-year inquiry.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E11, Police in Overland Park, Kansas, hunt for over 15 years for a serial killer who lures women to Kansas for sadomasochistic sexual trysts at hotels.

programme.title: Killings on Christmas Eve
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E02, A family is torn apart by their grandparents' murders. Two decades later, a cold case detective takes on the case that has haunted him since he was a child--racing to solve it before the family takes matters into their own hands.

programme.title: A Killer Slips Away
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E10, The loving aunt of a close-knit family is stabbed to death in her home. It takes two decades for detectives to discover that a key witness was an imposter--and caused the case to go cold.

programme.title: In The Care Of A Killer/Deadly Lies
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E30, The suspicious death of 2-year-old Billy Blankenship is solved when police force his babysitter to re-enact the circumstances of his death. Then, a murder case is solved when the dead man's body is accidentally found by divers.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E02, This is the story of the hunt for one of the most notorious serial killers in American history--the BTK killer. After committing at least seven brutal murders he vanished for over 25 years before sending clues of his crimes to the media in 2004.

programme.title: Sweethearts, Silenced
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E04, A killer authors a book about his con-man past that becomes the key to solving a 29-year-old cold case of two high school sweethearts--and three other cold case murders--leading police to believe he could be the Zodiac Killer.

programme.title: Blood Money/Precious Doe
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E20, Testimony about the growth of larvae in dead bodies helps convict the man who stabbed a couple to death and strangled their 4-year-old daughter in 1993.

programme.title: A Killer's Skin / Where's Peggy? (#110)
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E28, Police in Albany, N.Y., get a surprise when a killer they think targets only older women is suspected in the murder of an elderly man. And the contents of a secret storage shed holds the grisly clues to a murder that has gone cold for more than 14 years.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E17, A look at the case of James Allen Selby, a serial rapist who eluded police for years while attacking 11 women in five states - Oklahoma, Nevada, California, Arizona, and Colorado.

programme.title: The Voice In The Lake
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E01, When 31-year-old real estate appraiser Mike Williams mysteriously vanishes while duck hunting in the Florida swamps in December of 2000, authorities suspect he accidentally drowned. For sixteen years his disappearance remains a mystery.

programme.title: The Bone Keeper
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E22, In December 1985, when human bones are discovered in the woods, it puts an end to the search for missing teen David Reed. David's skull fractures point to murder; but it will be decades before investigators can find his killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E04, Work of an Alberta, Canada detective finally pays off when he tracks down the man who murdered a 6-year-old girl 10 years earlier. And when police search for the killer of a hitchhiker, they find that the victim's diary is one of their best clues.
MST3K: The Magic Voyage Of Sinbad (Sadko), 19930814000000 +0000, An adventurer sets sail in search of the bird of happiness in Sadko (1953).

programme.title: Code Name: Diamond Head
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Code Name: Diamond Head, S06E08, Counterintelligence takes on new meaning in this barely coherent tale of Hawaiian espionage that takes place on movie sets meant to look like Hawaii.
MST3K: The Painted Hills, 20170901070000 +0000, A Lassie movie, set in 1870s California amongst rival gold miners. The 1950s-era short teaches college students how to improve their hygiene.

programme.title: The Corpse Vanishes
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Corpse Vanishes, S01E05, In the theater, Joel and the Bots get the third installment of "Radar Men from the Moon" before the Bela Lugosi film "The Corpse Vanishes".

programme.title: Star Force: Fugitive Alien II
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000, S03E18, Ken and the crew of the Bacchus 3 return in Star Force: Fugitive Alien II (1987) while Joel and the Bots make a Captain Joe action figure and stage a "name that puppet" quiz show.

programme.title: Final Justice
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000, S10E08, When tough-as-nails Texas Deputy Sheriff Thomas Jefferson Geronimo captures a member of the Italian mob, only he can successfully get his prisoner back to Italy to stand trial.

MST3K: Gamera, 19910608000000 +0000, A giant mutated turtle wakes from eons of slumber and attacks Japan in Gamera: The Giant Monster (1965). The Bots create their own beauty salon and are treated to a visit from Gamera himself.

MST3K: Gamera Vs. Barugon, 19910622000000 +0000, The Mads send the crew another Gamera movie. This time, a group of travelers scour the jungle in search of a giant opal. What they find is actually the egg of a lizard-dog creature called Barugon.

MST3K: Gamera Vs. Gaos, 19910727000000 +0000, Gamera is back and this time he is up against Gaos, a bat-monster with the ability to shoot laser beams. Joel and the Bots make an arts and crafts project.

The Courageous Heart of Irena Sendler, 20090419000000 +0000, The story of Irena Sendler, a social worker who was part of the Polish underground during World War II and was arrested by the Nazi's for saving the lives of nearly 2,500 Jewish children by smuggling them out of the Warsaw ghetto.

Christmas in Conway, 20131201000000 +0000, Hoping it will be the perfect Christmas present for his wife (Mary-Louise Parker), a man (Andy Garcia) plans to construct a Ferris wheel in his backyard. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

William Faulkner's Old Man, 19970209000000 +0000, Set in the 1920s, a prison inmate is tempted by the opportunity to escape during a Mississippi flood. Stars Jeanne Tripplehorn and Arliss Howard. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E02, Hallmark Original Series. Jess turns to her mother for help planning her cousins wedding.

programme.title: Photographs and Memories

programme.title: It's Always Nashville

programme.title: Buried Treasures

programme.title: Grand Openings
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E06, Hallmark Original Series. As the nightclub opening nears, Trace spends late nights practicing.

programme.title: All Our Yesterdays

programme.title: Forest Through the Trees
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E08, Hallmark Original Series. Abby and Trace talk about their past and the future during a camping getaway.

programme.title: The Royal Court
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E09, Hallmark Original Series. After his band's video goes viral, Trace receives offers.

programme.title: Freefall
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E10, Hallmark Original Series. Mark offers Trace and his band a worldwide tour deal.
Return to Christmas Creek, 20181117000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. Amelia returns to Christmas Creek to rediscover family at Christmas.

programme.title: Grace Under Pressure
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E14, While testing a newly repaired puddle jumper, McKay and Captain Hugh Griffin suddenly lose control of the ship and crash into the ocean. As the jumper begins to sink slowly towards the bottom of the ocean, Griffin sacrifices himself to save McKay.

programme.title: The Tower
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E15, Sheppard and the team discover a world that has technology created by the Ancients. But the planet's royal family does not allow anyone but them to harness the technology and treat the villagers with little dignity.

programme.title: The Long Goodbye
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E16, The team discover two life pods floating in space. Upon further investigation, the team accidentally transfers the minds of the individuals into Sheppard and Weir. Things get worse when the team discovers the two people are out to destroy the other.

programme.title: Coup D'Etat
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E17, Col. Sheppard's team is urgently summoned to M1K-177, where Maj. Lorne's team has been attacked. When Sheppard and his unit arrive, however, all they find is a burned building containing charred bodies: presumably, Lorne and his men.

programme.title: Michael
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E18, Lt. Kenmore wakes up in the infirmary without his memory. He begins to think there is something wrong when his nightmares about being a Wraith seem to be more than real. His fears would be unfounded if not for the serum that turns Wraiths humans.

programme.title: Malice
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E08, Lucian Alliance prisoner Simeon escapes, creating a manhunt on a remote planet. But Homeworld Command orders he be captured alive, believing Simeon has valuable information. Simeon must be brought back to the Destiny before he kills or is killed.

programme.title: Visitation
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E09, With no recollection of how they got to the Destiny, crew members left behind over a year earlier make a mysterious return. After an unsettling turn, the memories stirred through regression therapy prove disastrous for those who’ve returned.

programme.title: Resurgence
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E10, In the hopes of finding something beneficial, the crew follows an energy signature that leads them to a mysterious sea of lifeless ships. With no visible signs of danger, the crew set off to take a closer look. But things may not be what they seem.

programme.title: Deliverance
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E11, Locked in a battle with a Drone Command Ship, the Destiny is surprised by the arrival of the aliens that abducted Rush and Chloe. After Destiny's position is revealed, the crew again comes under heavy attack. But this time, they have a plan.

programme.title: Past And Present
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E11, SG-1 encounters an entire planet suffering from amnesia. The planet's leader, a woman named Ke'ra, returns to Earth with SG-1 to find a cure. But as Ke'ra and Daniel develop a mutual attraction, SG-1 suspects she may not be who she appears to be.

programme.title: Jolinar's Memories
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E12, Carter's father has been captured on a moon transformed into hell. No one but Jolinar has ever escaped from hell, so Tok'ra technology is used to access Jolinar's memories from Carter's mind…but not before an old foe shows up to foil the mission!

programme.title: The Devil You Know
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E13, During a rescue attempt, SG-1 is caught by one of hell's denizens, who is determined to use the information they have to overthrow Goa'uld lord Sokar. Using Tok'ra technology, the team is forced to relive painful memories…but how much can they take?

programme.title: Foothold
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E14, During routine medical exams, Dr. Fraiser injects each team member with a sedative. Teal'c awakens and sees General Hammond conspiring with Fraiser and two aliens. What has happened at Stargate Command, and can SG-1 overpower its own allies?

programme.title: Pretense
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E15, When SG-1 is invited to planet Tollan to attend a Triad ceremony, they are shocked to discover it is actually a trial to determine the fate of their friend Skaara. Daniel and O'Neill must argue a case against a mysterious Goa'uld to save Skaara.

programme.title: Urgo
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E16, En route to a planet, the SG-1 are implanted with an alien spore that evolves into a being called Urgo. Though Urgo claims to be friendly, the suspicious team members work feverishly to rid themselves of the creature before it destroys their minds.

programme.title: A Hundred Days
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E17, SG-1 visits the friendly planet Edora and gathers to watch the annual meteor shower that lights up the sky like a fiery rain. But suddenly, wayward asteroids bombard the planet, destroying the Stargate. Can O'Neill and the team ever return home?

programme.title: Shades Of Grey
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E18, On a mission to Tollana, O'Neill steals a weapon there and takes it back to Earth. When Hammond discovers the deception, he suspends O'Neill. But O'Neill's misconduct is only the beginning of a deep mystery that could have catastrophic consequences.

programme.title: We Need a Vacation
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E15, Craig, Cort, and Eddie take a road trip to Mexico, but their vacation south of the border turns ugly when they tangle with an angry American tourist. Meanwhile, Captian Thorpe becomes Mitch's uninvited house guest. Hobie develops a crush on Shauni.

programme.title: Muddy Waters
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E16, Cort and Eddie train lifeguards at a water park, but someone is vandalizing the waterslides, putting people's lives in danger. Meanwhile, Captain Thorpe wants Shauni fired for posing in a provocative calendar.

programme.title: Snake Eyes
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E17, Eddie and Cort happen upon an illegal gambling ship. Meanwhile, Mitch begins to spend more time with Hobie's English teacher – a liaison that embarrasses Hobie beyond belief.

programme.title: Eclipse
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E18, After losing his rookie partner in the mysterious rescue of what he thinks is a ghost, Eddie gets unwittingly caught up in a 70-year-old legend. Meanwhile, Hobie attempts to help a friend find a new home for her dog.

programme.title: Shark Derby
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E19, A local restaurateur puts up a $25,000 bounty for the largest shark caught during the weekend's Shark Derby he's sponsoring. To attract more sharks, he illegally chums the waters, drawing hundreds of sharks uncommonly close to shore.

programme.title: The Big Race
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E20, Cort promises to come up with $10,000 for a nursing home, but he needs Mitch and Craig's help to compete in a water-skiing race with a big cash prize. Shauni’s traumatic fear of the ocean after Jill’s death threatens her future with Baywatch.

programme.title: Old Friends
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E21, Craig, Mitch, and Garner go for a weekend hang-gliding trip, but Mitch has a serious accident, and ends up facing death before the fangs of a rattlesnake! Cort reacquaints himself with a woman who has a shocking secret.

programme.title: The End?
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E22, A massive earthquake destroys Baywatch headquarters and leaves Gina's life hanging in the balance. Meanwhile, Cort and Craig are trapped in the ocean. And Eddie is the only one left who can help a pregnant woman going into labor.

programme.title: Nightmare Bay, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E01, Mitch rescues an underwater photographer that appears to have been attacked by a Sea Creature in an underwater cave, resulting in a media frenzy. Shauni rescues a young girl in the ocean then has to rescue her family from drowning.

programme.title: Nightmare Bay, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E02, When a fishing trawler mysteriously sinks, the “Creature in the Bay” is thought responsible! Mitch, Devon and Captain Thorpe set out to prove there is more than meets the eye behind this Creature's mysterious attacks.

programme.title: The One Who Got Away
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E03, After Baywatch lifeguard Megan is attacked on the beach, she struggles to regain her confidence – unaware that her attacker, a fisherman, views her as the "One That Got Away." Meanwhile, Shauni suffers from lifeguard burnout.

programme.title: Money, Honey
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E04, After Mitch makes a heroic ocean rescue while working at her private beach party, a Hollywood producer offers Mitch the starring role in a movie. Meanwhile, Harvey and Shauni hold a wild bikini contest to raise money for an aquatic rescue group.

programme.title: The Fabulous Buchannon Boys
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E05, Mitch receives an unexpected visit from his free-spirited brother, whose troubled son entices Hobie to surf the pylons of a treacherous condemned pier. Meanwhile, a local vendor nearly causes a riot when his bikinis disintegrate in the water.

programme.title: Point of Attack
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E06, After helping break up a gang fight on the beach, Eddie gets the idea of having some gang members join the lifeguard W.A.T.E.R. program designed to help troubled youths.

programme.title: Sandcastles
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E07, Baywatch lifeguards gain insight into the plight of the homeless when Hobie befriends a girl who's living on the streets. Eddie is attacked by a former mental patient known as “Hector the Collector.”

programme.title: Thin or Die
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E08, Eddie goes on a blind date with Nicole, who turns out to be morbidly overweight, which leads to complications and an unlikely friendship. But Nicole's diet pills prove life-threatening. Meanwhile, Mitch’s life is comically disrupted by a stray dog.

programme.title: The Trophy, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E09, Eddie is arrested for statutory rape after a teenage girl lies about seducing him in his tower. Meanwhile, Eric Turner, bitter about the paralyzing accident he suffered as a lifeguard, returns to Baywatch to reconcile his relationship with Megan.
